source.name: Buffer for the Final Critical Habitat for the Sonora chub (Gila ditaenia)
source.description: Abstract: To provide the user with a general idea of areas where a buffer for the final critical habitat for Sonora chub (Gila ditaenia) occur based on the description provided in the Federal Register. The geographic extent includes Santa Cruz County, Arizona. Purpose: Critical habitat are areas considered essential for the conservation of a listed species. These areas provide notice to the public and land managers the importance of these areas to the conservation of this species. Special protections and/or restrictions are possible in areas where federal funding, permits, licenses, authorizations, or actions occur or are required.
